query: WITH entities AS (SELECT party_id, id FROM core_customers WHERE COALESCE(kyc_verification = $1, $1 IS NULL) AND COALESCE(activity = $2, $2 IS NULL) AND (COALESCE((party_id, id) > ($5, $4), $4 IS NULL)) ORDER BY party_id ASC, id ASC LIMIT $3) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: Repo__Id", e.sequence, e.event, CASE WHEN $6 THEN e.context ELSE NULL::jsonb END as "context: es_entity::ContextData", e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_customer_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.party_id asc, i.id asc, i.id, e.sequence
